price: 83. Ee xurmo oo dhan waxaa iska leh oo (xumaan ka) hufan (Alle) ay Gacantiisu ku jiraan Mulkiga (iyo Maamulka) wax kasta,  Xaggiisaana dib la idiinku soo celin18.
arabic: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
footnotes: 18. Maalinta uu Alle u kala garsoori doono addoomahiisa oo abaal marin.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fasub'ḥāna alladhī biyadihi malakūtu kulli shayin wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
